summary:
Not exactly lore-friendly, it adds a few stashes through out Skyrim and beyond (dawnguard dlc and dragonborn dlc locations).
The thing is, its one container.
You open any hidden stash and put stuff into it, you can pick it back up from any other stash on any different location.
Its a conviniance thing.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Hidden Safe Storage
=================================================================================================================================
DESCRIPTION

Not exactly lore-friendly, it adds a few stashes through out Skyrim and beyond (dawnguard dlc and dragonborn dlc locations).
The thing is, its one container.
You open any hidden stash and put stuff into it, you can pick it back up from any other stash on any different location.
Its a conviniance thing.
Now heres the catch, you got to find them. >:D Lets hope you have a good eye for changes.
Placed at least one in each hold, and some holds have them outside as well.
Theres one in Riverwood ofcourse. The start point.
Just to clear things up, its not hidden, its just clutter items that seem hidden from general thought.
Heres some so you get the idea, right at Riverwood trader and one in Whiterun entrance by the blacksmith.
There are two more in whiterun.
If its a chest, youll know via a first time open message on each hidden stashes.
If its a clutter, you will notice its activatable and it usually read hidden stash, hollowed out etc
and its gonna inform you that you found a new stash.

Since its not lore friendly to pick up stuff from any location, might as well work for it.
(Wish i could erase my memory to join the fun. xD)

IMPORTANT
May conflict with other mods that modify world space. Adding or rearranging clutter etc.
You can avoid that and have more flexibility if this mod doesnt suit your needs but the functionality does
with this mod!

Craftable Cloud Storage mod

VulcanTourist brought this to my attention. Thanks!
=================================================================================================================================
REQUIREMENTS
Skyrim v1.9+ (duh)
Dawnguard DLC
Dragonborn DLC
SKSE
=================================================================================================================================
RECOMMENDED INSTALL
Install with Mod Organizer <3

MANUAL INSTALL\UNINSTALL
Extract the content from the .rar archive and place the files in "Skyrim\Data" where the game is installed.
Example of default Skyrim installed location:
Windows x32
(C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\
Windows x64
(C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\
=================================================================================================================================
FILES AND FOLDERS

Hidden Safe Storage v1.0 readme.txt
Hidden Safe Storage.esp

Scripts\
theimmersionHSS.pex
Scripts\Source\
theimmersionHSS.psc
=================================================================================================================================
DISCLAIMER
I am not responsible for any and all damages that arise from use of this mod.
Use at your own risk!

General Permission!
You can do with the mod itself what ever you want (modify, improve or simplify) for personal use only.
However, You cant include or claim as Your own any modified or unmodified files outside "Special Permisions" and commertialize or reupload them.

Special Permissions!
You may modify, include, reupload or otherwise use the following files and folders as You see fit.
(Do remember to rename them for your own mod to avoid conflicts.)
Plugin and Scripts. (Source scripts included for that purpouse.)

Special Permission apllies to the following files:
You can do what ever you want with any and all files within this mod.
=================================================================================================================================
CHANGELOG

Initial version
Made this a few years.

1.0
Added a few more to holds and some other places for the release version.
=================================================================================================================================
CURRENT BUILD NOTES
Hope it works. xD

FUTURE PLANS
Expand if requested.
=================================================================================================================================
MISCELLANEOUS

Made this a few years back for myself. Added only Riverwood and Whiterun stashes. Usually, thats my main route in game.
Riverwood - whtierun - Whiterun - Riverwood. I got tired of the running and fast traveling.
So i made this mod so i can stash my loot and use what and when needed for smithing in Whitrun or selling when im in Riverwood etc.

I thought, why dont i share this. Someone might need it, or find it useful.
But not everyone is playing like me, so i redone the whole mod and added stashes in all major holds and a few (imo) places of interest.

Enjoy! ;)
=================================================================================================================================
CREDITS
Original Author: theimmersion
Other Contributors: Creation kit for not crashing! xD
=================================================================================================================================[/center]
author: theimmersion
